statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE critical_stock_threshold < 10;
SELECT product_name, critical_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 100;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE critical_stock_threshold < 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS average_stock FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock, last_update FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, last_update ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT availability_id, product_id, location_id, available_quantity FROM product_availability WHERE available_quantity > 100 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 25 AND product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;

SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock, last_update FROM inventory JOIN product_availability ON inventory.product_id = product_availability.product_id WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY last_update ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory WHERE last_update >= '2022-01-01' AND last_update <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity, manager_id FROM warehouses WHERE capacity < 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, in_stock FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, in_stock, last_updated FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM ProductAvailability WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT supply_id, supplier_name, order_date FROM SupplyChain WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, location_name FROM Inventory i JOIN Location l ON i.location = l.location_name WHERE i.quantity > 10 ORDER BY i.product_name DESC;

SELECT i.product_name, a.available_quantity, a.last_updated FROM Inventory i JOIN ProductAvailability a ON i.product_id = a.product_id WHERE a.available_quantity > 0 AND a.location_id = 1 ORDER BY a.last_updated DESC;
SELECT supply_id, supplier_name, order_date, delivery_date FROM SupplyChain WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;

SELECT i.product_name, SUM(s.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory i JOIN SupplyChain s ON i.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY i.product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT order_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE capacity > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM locations WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
